column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Yesterday after lunch I decided I wanted a book to read .
#text=I went to my local library and browsed the shelves for something I would enjoy reading .
#text=After finding my favorite section of the library I looked at the titles of each book .
#text=I picked out a book I thought sounded interesting and read the back cover to make sure the story sounded amusing .
#text=After reading the back cover I was excited about the contents of the book .
#text=I took the book up to the front of the library where the librarian sat at her desk .
#text=I informed her that I found the book I wanted and was ready to check out .
#text=She scanned the bar code on the book and let me know it was due to be returned in five days .
#text=I left the library full of anxiousness to go read my book .
